section.p: ‘Who was it?’ one of the pallbearers asks.
‘Just a vagabond,’ replies another. ‘They found the body in this very barn. Died of exposure. Apparently old Kitsuno owns the land hereabouts, so he got lumbered with the funeral costs.’
‘Poor chap. Still, he can afford it.’
The lid of the coffin is open. You sneak a peek and then wish you hadn’t. It is not a pleasant experience to see your own dead body.
